sentences.sContent: Some associations of species are almost a form of commensalism.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some associations of species are almost a form of commensalism.
sentences.sCn: 有些种类的组合几乎是共栖的形式。

sentences.sContent: The symbiosis behavior mode of enterprise and farmer household include commensalism, dissymmetry mutualism and symmetry mutualism.
sentences.sContent_eng: The symbiosis behavior mode of enterprise and farmer household include commensalism, dissymmetry mutualism and symmetry mutualism.
sentences.sCn: 企业与农户共生行为模式包括偏利共生、非对称性互惠共生和对称性互惠共生三种。

sentences.sContent: Otherwise, choosing market segmenting and niche so as to change the relationship from competition to commensalism and reciprocity between first-mover and second-mover should be a good choice.
sentences.sContent_eng: Otherwise, choosing market segmenting and niche so as to change the relationship from competition to commensalism and reciprocity between first-mover and second-mover should be a good choice.
sentences.sCn: 相反，则宜采取市场细分“拾余补漏”策略将与先行者的竞争关系转化为互惠共生关系。

words.tran: 共餐者；[生态] 共生体
